entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Kelowna
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:04 AM PST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kelowna Airport 03:00 AM PST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Condition: Fog
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -1.4°C
Wind: N 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2
